item.title: What's wrong with this code?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Incase you didnt see what Miyu changed, he added a } at the very end of the code.

item.title: What's wrong with this code?
item.dc:creator: @miyu_miyu5 miyu miyu5
item.description:
@miyu_miyu5 wrote:

im surpised that u have this question with so much rep well anywayz…

if (!p.smitePrayOn) { p.magePrayOn = false; p.rangePrayOn = false; p.meleePrayOn = false; if (p.drainDelay > 0) { p.drainDelay = p.drainDelay; } else { p.drainDelay = 8; } p.usingPrayer = true; p.headIconPrayer = 4; p.smitePrayOn = true; } else { p.usingPrayer = false; p.headIconPrayer = -1; p.smitePrayOn = false; } p.appearanceUpdateReq = true; p.updateReq = true; } }

There u go should work now u forgot a } remember u need a } for every {

Read full topic

item.title: What's wrong with this code?
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

/**
* Prayer headicons, interfaces, etc...
*/
		if (!p.smitePrayOn) {
			p.magePrayOn = false;
			p.rangePrayOn = false;
			p.meleePrayOn = false;
			if (p.drainDelay > 0) {
				p.drainDelay = p.drainDelay;
			} else {
				p.drainDelay = 8;
			}
			p.usingPrayer = true;
			p.headIconPrayer = 4;
			p.smitePrayOn = true;
	 	} else {
			p.usingPrayer = false;
			p.headIconPrayer = -1;
			p.smitePrayOn = false;
			}
		p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
		p.updateReq = true;
	    }

Gives me 100 errors…

Read full topic
